refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The kas quit command ends interactive mode, severing the authenticated connection to one or more Authentication Server processes and returning the issuer to the normal shell prompt.
This command is operative only during interactive mode, so omit the kas command suite name from the command line.

listitem.para: Prints the online help for this command. All other valid options are ignored.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para: The following example demonstrates how the normal command shell prompt returns when the issuer leaves interactive mode.

refsect1.title: Privilege Required
refsect1.para: None, and no password is required.
